        Returns the users of the system

      • getUserById

        Returns a user searched by the id
        Parameters:
        id - this is the id of the user that we are looking for
        Returns:
        the user retrieved from the database

      • createUser

        User createUser​(java.lang.String firstName,
                java.lang.String lastName,
                java.lang.String username,
                java.lang.String password,
                int rolId)
        Creates a user in the system
        Parameters:
        firstName - this is the firstName of the user we want to create
        lastName - this is the lastName of the user we want to create
        username - this is the username of the user we want to create
        password - this is the password of the user we want to create
        rolId - this is the rolId of the user we want to create
        Returns:
        the created user

                java.lang.String username)
        Updates the param of a user
        Parameters:
        id - this is the id of the user that we want to update
        firstName - this is the firstName of the user we want to update
        lastName - this is the lastName of the user we want to update
        username - this is the username of the user we want to update
        Returns:
        the updated user

      • deleteUser

        boolean deleteUser​(int id)
        Deletes a user
        Parameters:
        id - this is the id of the user that we are deleting
        Returns:
        a boolean specifying true if success and false in case of error

      • login
